name: milling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
moving around in a large group, with no particular purpose, or in no particular direction: I lost sight of him among the milling crowds.

Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of cutting metal or making it into particular shapes using a special machine, or of crushing grain into flour: Some wheat is not suitable for flour milling. milling machines/equipment the milling industry/process
